WorkItem.Description: Modify the SQL2005DB Project to align with MSDN's student DB Sample. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb399731.aspx. After modification, the DB project will include 8 tables, 8 Foreign Keys, 7 Stored Procedures. And the project also uses Post-Deployment script to insert test data.
WorkItem.Summary: Modify the SQL2005DB Project to align with MSDN Student DB sample
